title: About Pat
description: This about page shines a glorious and biased light upon who I am as a person, including my values, life story, hobbies, mindset, etc. To see the other about page - the one about what I can do - click here.
content: I value ridiculous laughs, tomfoolery, ballyhoo, attempting to frown while skipping, existential crises, type 2 fun, eco-friendly glitter, naked bike rides, ultimate frisbee, almond butter, expertly-roasted ‘mallows, bunny ears, funkadelic tunes, shower thoughts, and stories of romance. Or in short: I'm a happy-go-lucky ball of silliness. Pity for my bank account I also value human rights, equity, inclusivity, the environment, future generations, human connection, minimalism, et al. But lest I get ahead of myself, this about page isn’t really about career stuff. Click here for that. ... ummm, this is awkward, but it looks like I got distracted in the middle of writing this. So, just pretend I'm awesome, okay?
